participant_1.background:
I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.
I am not concerned about my appearance in the morning because I have more important things to focus on.
i like all types of music.
My comic book collection was stolen from my apartment when I was away on vacation.
I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake.

participant_2.background:
I have a classic car that my friends love to ride in when we go out.
i am a childrens librarian.
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.
I have a Honda Civic Hybrid because it's fuel-efficient and spacious enough for my sister and me to explore new places.
i am a closet cannibal.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go out and explore new places with my sister. We have a Honda Civic Hybrid that is fuel-efficient and spacious enough to take on any adventure!
That sounds fun! I love exploring new places too. I have a classic car that I like to take out on weekends.
That's awesome! I love classic cars. What kind do you have?
I have a 1967 Mustang. It's a lot of fun to drive, and it gets a lot of attention when I'm out and about.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to own a classic car.
They're a lot of fun, but they can be a bit of a hassle to maintain.
I know what you mean. I've heard that classic cars can be pretty expensive to repair.
Yeah, they can be. But it's worth it to me to be able to drive around in a piece of history.
I totally agree! I love the look and feel of classic cars.
Me too! They're just so much more stylish than modern cars.
I know, right? I wish they still made cars like that today.
Me too. But I guess we'll just have to enjoy the classic cars that are still on the road.
That's right! We can always dream of owning one someday.
Yeah, maybe one day we'll be able to afford a classic car.
I hope so! It would be so much fun to drive around in one.
